1302:2: 1 | kulaputreṇa kuladuhitrā vā caratā ṣaṭ pāramitā gaveṣayatā'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prahātavyāḥ sapta dharmāḥ |
1302:5: akalyāṇamitrāṇi śikṣayanti parihartamanuttarāṃ śraddhāmudāttaṃ saṃkalpamanuttamaṃ vīryaṃ samuccetuṃ ca saṃkliṣṭācārān |
1302:6: dvitīyaṃ prajahāti strīrūpaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pṛthagjanairvivikto bhavatyasahacaraḥ |
1302:8: caturthaṃ prajahāti dveṣapratidhamauddhatyaṃ mānamīrṣvāmasūyāṃ yato jayate kalahaḥ pratihanyate kuśalacittam |
1302:9: pañcamaṃ prajahāti pramādaṃ madamānaṃ kausīdyaṃ svakaṃ parittakuśalaṃ ca yenāvajānāti parān |
1302:10: ṣaṣṭhaṃ prajahāti tairthikāgamaṃ kāvyāni na cābuddhabhāṣitāni praśaṃsati |
1302:13: uktaṃ bhagavatā na paśyāmi tathānyāndharmānya āvṛṇvanti buddhamārgaṃ yatheme saptadharmāḥ|
1302:19: śrāvakā api bodhisattvaṃ gambhīradharmakośe pāramitāsu saṃpratiṣṭhāpayanto bhavanti bodhisattvasya kalpāṇamitrāṇi |
1302:23: tṛtīyaṃ bodhisattvena draṣṭavyaḥ kāyo malabhūmivadaśucisaṃśrayaḥ kevalaṃ vātaśleṣmapittalohitakamarāgārho dine dine maraṇonmukho'nādarabuddhyā parihartavyaḥ sotsāhaṃ bhāvayitavyo mārgaḥ |
1302:24: caturthaṃ bodhisattvena nityaṃ caritavyā śāntiḥ kṣāntirgurukaraṇīyā mṛdutāca |
1302:26: paṃcamaṃ bodhisattvenācaritavyaṃ vīryamutpādayitavyā hrīrapatrapā ca pūjayitavya upādhyāyaḥ karuṇāyitavyā dīnā duḥkhitāndṭaṣṭrā svakāyena parigrahītavyaṃ tadduḥkham |
1302:27: ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvenabhāvayitavyaṃ vipulaṃ mahāyānabodhisattvapiṭakaṃ grahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā dharmmā buddhānuśaṃsitāḥ |
1302:30: bhūtalakṣaṇamekalakṣaṇamalakṣaṇam bodhisattvaścetkāmayate śīghramabhisambodhimabhyupagantavyā evamime sapta dharmāḥ |
1302:31: 3 | punaḥ khalu puruṣaḥ prāptihetorutpādayati ced bodhicittamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ saṃgṛhṇati maitrīṃkaruṇāṃ muditāmupekṣāṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñām |
1302:32: jñātavyaṃ na sa puruṣaḥ prajñahāti jātimaraṇam |
1302:35: [bodhi-] cittaprāptirapyasti prāptidṭaṣṭiḥ skandhadhātvāyatanadṭaṣṭirātmadṭaṣṭiḥ pudgaladṭasṭiḥ sattvadṭaṣṭi jīrvadṭaṣṭi maitrīkaruṇāmuditopokṣādānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñādidṭaṣṭiḥ |
1302:40: puruṣā mithyādṭaṣṭayaścakavatparivartante trighātau sadaiva parihīyante vimukteḥ |
1302:46: cittaṃ nāma manovijñānamevaṃ vijñānaskandho mana āyatanaṃ mano dhātuḥ |
1302:47: cittaṃ śūnyalakṣaṇaṃ na cittaṃ cittalakṣaṇaṃ na ca kartṛ|
1302:49: yā cittalakṣaṇaśūnyatā sā na ca kartrī na ca kārayitrī |
1302:50: yadi kaścitkarttaiva nāsti na tarhi kartṛlakṣaṇam |
1302:52: anāsaktiheto rna jānātikuśalākuśalafalavipāka iti ācaritāyāṃ maintryāṃ jānāti nāstyātmā |
1302:63: na ca prajñāvāptirna ca prajñā dṭaṣṭiḥ |
1302:65: na catasyācaritaṃ bhavati kiṃcita na cāpi nācaritaṃ bhavati kiṃcit |
1302:66: antaḥ pariśuddho'pi sa vinetuṃ sattvanācarati ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ |
1302:67: ya acaratyevaṃ bhāvayati cittaṃ kṣaṇamavaropitakuśalasyāpi tasya puṇyafalavipāko'prameyo'paryantaḥ |
